channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole in road, 11th November
item.description:
Pot hole just before Welcome to Gotherington sign, entering Gotherington.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded double yellow lines, 11th November
item.description:
From Regents Court Side to the junction of andover road and St Stephens Road people are parking there everyday and causing problems for 94 95

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Stephen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 11th November
item.description:
Blocked Drain Cheltenham GL50 1UF blocked for over a month . It has been a problem every year and Highways have cleared it in the past . It is a dangerous situation as it creates a bottleneck and a high risk of collision
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other problem, 11th November

item.title: Large pothole and several other small potholes all around this junction, 11th November
item.description:
On vicarage lane brockworth by junction with mill lane .one pothole near this has just been filled but this one has been left for some reason ! there are several holes all around this junction please fill them all .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
